Unleash Speed Program

Break through your speed plateaus with our intensive 8-week program. Specialized interval training, VO2 max improvement, and advanced techniques to help you run faster than ever before.

Start Training Now Learn More

Why Speed Training Works

Our scientifically-backed approach to speed development will transform your running performance in just 8 weeks.

Increased VO2 Max

Improve your body's ability to utilize oxygen for better endurance and speed.

Lactate Threshold

Push your lactate threshold higher to maintain faster paces for longer.

Neuromuscular Power

Develop explosive power and improve your running economy.

Speed Endurance

Maintain your top speed for longer distances and race situations.

Training Components

A comprehensive approach to speed development covering all aspects of fast running.

Advanced Interval Training

  • 400m, 800m, and 1200m repeats
  • Pyramid and ladder workouts
  • Fartlek and tempo intervals
  • Progressive interval sessions

Speed Endurance Work

  • Threshold pace training
  • Cruise intervals
  • Tempo runs and time trials
  • Race pace simulations

Neuromuscular Power

  • Strides and accelerations
  • Hill sprints
  • Plyometric exercises
  • Form drills

Recovery & Support

  • Active recovery sessions
  • Mobility and flexibility work
  • Injury prevention protocols
  • Nutrition for speed training

8-Week Program Breakdown

Progressive speed development with carefully planned intensity and recovery.

1-2

Foundation

  • • Speed endurance base
  • • Form assessment
  • • Basic intervals
  • • Neuromuscular activation
3-4

Development

  • • Increased intensity
  • • Lactate threshold work
  • • Hill training
  • • Power development
5-6

Peak

  • • Maximum intensity
  • • VO2 max sessions
  • • Speed endurance
  • • Race simulation
7-8

Integration

  • • Speed maintenance
  • • Time trials
  • • Race preparation
  • • Performance testing
